content: the leaﬂines shawlette features a cable pattern reminiscent of the veins on leaves and leaf-like shapes the shawlette is worked outwards from the center of the top edge and ﬁnished with a beaded edging the intermediate-level design requires the ability to work and recognize front and back post stitches thank you to the awesome team of official testers blabbott 1 bizyhands 2 cindi120 3 dplantlady 4 jaye-yarns 5 korina 6 marjos 7 piggywiggy96 8 sarahelizabethii 9 vallynmar 10 vibeskat 11 1 http //www ravelry com/people/blabbott 2 http //www ravelry com/people/bizyhands 3 http //www ravelry com/people/cindi120 4 http //www ravelry com/people/dplantlady 5 http //www ravelry com/people/jaye-yarns 6 http //www ravelry com/people/korina 7 http //www ravelry com/people/marjos 8 http //www ravelry com/people/piggywiggy96 9 http //www ravelry com/people/sarahelizabethii 10 http //www ravelry com/people/vallynmar 11 http //www ravelry com/people/vibeskat
